text.__SUMMARY__: Conus geeraertsi is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusc in the family Conidae, the cone snails, cone shells or cones.This snail is predatory and venomous and is capable of "stinging" humans.
text.Distribution: This marine species of cone snail occurs off the Philippines.
text.References: Poppe G.T. & Tagaro S.P. (2017). New Conidae from the central Philippines. Visaya. 4(6): 5-18. page(s): 9, pl. 4
